monsters.name: Dust Biter
monsters.description: A small, mischievous creature that feeds on dust and causes allergies.
monsters.method: Swiftly strikes with its tiny fangs, leaving a tickling sensation.

monsters.name: Moldy Muncher
monsters.description: A slimy monster that thrives in damp places and feasts on mold.
monsters.method: Engulfs moldy surfaces, dissolving them with its acidic saliva.

monsters.name: Laundry Lurker
monsters.description: A sneaky monster that hides in piles of dirty laundry and steals socks.
monsters.method: Snatches socks with lightning speed, leaving behind a mismatched pair.

monsters.name: Cobweb Crawler
monsters.description: A spider-like creature that weaves sticky webs in corners and loves dark spaces.
monsters.method: Entangles prey in its sticky silk, immobilizing them for consumption.

monsters.name: Stain Stalker
monsters.description: A relentless monster that preys on fresh stains and leaves behind smears.
monsters.method: Absorbs stains with its porous skin, leaving behind a trail of smudges.

monsters.name: Trash Titan
monsters.description: A towering creature formed from piles of garbage that leaves a trail of filth.
monsters.method: Crushes and suffocates prey under layers of compacted trash.

monsters.name: Sweeping Specter
monsters.description: A ghostly apparition that haunts brooms and causes dust clouds to form.
monsters.method: Whirls up dust storms, disorienting and choking its unsuspecting victims.

monsters.name: Grime Gremlin
monsters.description: A mischievous imp that revels in dirt and grime, leaving smudges everywhere.
monsters.method: Smears its slimy hands on surfaces, leaving behind a trail of grime.

monsters.name: Window Wraith
monsters.description: A translucent phantom that smears windows and mirrors with its touch.
monsters.method: Leaves oily residue with every touch, clouding the clarity of glass.

monsters.name: Dishwasher Devourer
monsters.description: A voracious creature that consumes dishes and utensils, leaving them dirty.
monsters.method: Swallows dishes whole, regurgitating them covered in a layer of grime.

monsters.name: Mop Menace
monsters.description: A slippery monster that soaks up water, leaving wet footprints behind.
monsters.method: Drenches its surroundings with water, causing slippery hazards.

monsters.name: Gutter Ghoul
monsters.description: A creature lurking in gutters that clogs them with leaves and debris.
monsters.method: Creates blockages by jamming gutters with twigs, leaves, and slime.

monsters.name: Perky Sparx
monsters.description: A lively monster that creates electrical malfunctions and power outages.
monsters.method: Can deliver a painful zap, ouch!

monsters.name: Vacuum Vortex
monsters.description: A whirlwind-like monster that devours everything in its path, scattering debris.
monsters.method: Sucks up objects with its powerful suction force, leaving chaos in its wake.

monsters.name: Pest Pestilence
monsters.description: A swarm of tiny creatures that infest homes and cause havoc.
monsters.method: Overwhelms spaces with sheer numbers, devouring food and spreading disease.

monsters.name: Ironing Imp
monsters.description: A mischievous imp that creases clothes and leaves iron marks behind.
monsters.method: Leaves behind iron marks and wrinkles by dancing across freshly ironed clothes.

monsters.name: Sponge Siphoner
monsters.description: A sponge-like monster that absorbs water and leaves surfaces damp.
monsters.method: Sucks up water from surfaces, leaving them soaked and prone to mildew.

monsters.name: Lawn Litterbug
monsters.description: A creature that scatters trash and debris across lawns and gardens.
monsters.method: Scatters garbage and debris across lawns, creating eyesores and attracting pests.

monsters.name: Toilet Terror
monsters.description: Emerges from toilets, causing clogs and splashing water on unsuspecting victims.
monsters.method: Causes toilet clogs and splashes water, creating unpleasant surprises.

monsters.name: Shower Slimer
monsters.description: A slimy creature that oozes in showers and leaves behind a sticky residue.
monsters.method: Coats shower surfaces with slimy residue, making them slippery and uncomfortable.
